name: Mochi Gang
description:
"Mochi Gang" is a puzzle platformer in 3D where you control three protagonist. Every ten second, the played character is switched. Rescue the third member of the gang, and get revenge on your foe !

- Controller supported.

- move with ZQSD, the arrow key or the stick

- Interact with enter, E, or the controller front buttons

- Jump with spacebar or A button on your controller!

Feel free to leave a message on the Ludum dare's game page :))

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/mochi-gang
